price: Ԑberε a εdͻm mmienu no hunuu wͻn ho no, Mose nkorͻfoͻ no kaa sε: “Nokorε sε, (Farao ne ne dͻm yi) bεto yεn “.
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
